title: Corn 🌽 Capsicum Rice | Video 🥰
content: Hi Everyone, I am on cloud ☁️ nine 😍 because I have started making videos on my YouTube Channel friends, it’s my next level to blogging but I won’t stop blogging, I’m sure about it I will definitely continue both and I will justify both things in my way 😊🥰 I know you all have showered so much love, support to my blog from day 1 and I have the same confidence that I will make a successful YouTube channel as well. I hope you all shower love, support and encouragement from your side to my youtube channel, I will share all the links below so that you can go through 👍🙂 My YouTube Channel: Click below link to visit channel: YouTube Channel: Ramya Recipes Please do like, share and subscribe to my channel 🥰 Earlier, I have shared the written recipe of corn capsicum rice but today I am sharing the full detailed recipe on a video clip through YouTube Channel. Video clip of Corn Capsicum Rice: [youtube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YFR3jfU6riM] Corn Capsicum Written Recipe:  Tri-color Capsicum Rice Looking forward to your suggestions 🤩 Thank You All :) Happy Cooking, Have a great day :) Follow us: Facebook Instagram Twitter Google+ Share your comments in the below section, I like to know your opinion © 2017- 2019 Ramyarecipes
